name: KillBoy
description:
KillBoy is a Singleplayer and Multiplayer zombie shooter.

The Singleplayer allows the players to fight throughout the entire round which lasts for a total of 5 minutes and overcome a number of different obstacles. Obstacles such as:

  • Zombies
  • Environmental Hazards
  • Camp Fires

The Objective of the Singleplayer is to finish the game as fast as you can, based on the time at which you finish the game your scores are updated and all the other players can view your scores.

The Multiplayer is a different game mode to the Singleplayer as it requires the players to work together and use team work and communication to beat the waves of zombies. The objective of this game mode is to try and get to the highest wave of zombies, as the wave number is updated to the live scoreboard.

The Game Includes the following features:

  • 3D Assets and Models
  • Animations
  • Dynamic Game Camera
  • Shoot Zombies
  • In-game Obstacles
  • Special Effects
  • Player Inventory
  • Power-Ups and Loot Drops
  • Custom Audio
  • Automated Obstacles
  • World Trigger Events
  • Different Weapons
  • Save / Load Game
  • Scoreboard
  • Multiplayer
